Signs and Symptoms Approximate number of patients (when available) Hereditary nonpolyposis colorectal carcinoma - Neoplasm of the stomach - Renal cell carcinoma - Transitional cell carcinoma of the bladder - Uterine leiomyosarcoma - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
